title: Samo Å alamon Sextet - The Colours Suite (2017)
description: Samo Šalamon Sextet The Colours Suite 2017 - Clean Feed Records, Ljubljana Jazz Series: CF414CD https://cleanfeed-records.com/product/the-colours-suite/ http://www.ljubljanajazz.si/index.php/slv/festival/ljubljana-jazz-series * Achille Succi : bass clarinet * Julian Argüelles : tenor saxophone, soprano saxophone * Samo Šalamon : guitar * Pascal Niggenkemper: bass * Roberto Dani : drums * Christian Lillinger: drums http://www.achillesucci.it/ http://www.julianarguelles.com/ http://www.samosalamon.com/ http://www.pascalniggenkemper.com/ http://www.robertodani.com/ http://www.christian-lillinger.com/ Recorded live by Luís Delgado at Jazz Festival Ljubljana on June 30th 2016. http://195.69.97.23/2016/jazz/index.php/en/?id=45 Reviews ~~~~~~~ By George W. Harris http://www.jazzweekly.com/2017/06/samo-salamon-sextet-the-colours-suite/ Earth-toned guitarist Samo Salamon delivers an 8 part suited dedicated to colors with a rainbow sounding cast of Achille Succi/bcl, Julian Arguelles/ts-ss, Pascal Niggenkemper/b (I am not referring to that name again for the sake of carpal tunnel syndrome prevention!) and the two drum team of Roberto Dani with Christian Lillinger. The band has a loose, Mingusy feel, with some nimble double reed work slithering between Salamon’s guitar on the dark and intricate “Yellow” and the gentle and moody “Green.” Succi gurgles to Arguelles’ soprano sax while the drums converse on “Red” whereas the bass clarinet and tenor produce a palpable molasses on the thick “Black” while bass and guitar lines lope over the drum work. The reeds get slapped around after the drums do some stick work for Salamon on “Grey,” producing a prism of a release. -- By Connor Kurtz http://www.freejazzblog.org/2017/08/samo-salamon-sextet-colours-suite-clean.html By Glenn Astarita https://www.allaboutjazz.com/the-colours-suite-samo-salamon-clean-feed-records-review-by-glenn-astarita.php By Raul da Gama https://jazzdagama.com/music/samo-salamon-sextet-colours-suite/ Brigita Gračner (si) https://radiostudent.si/glasba/tolpa-bumov/samo-%C5%A1alamon-sextet-the-colours-suite Guy Peters (be) https://jazzmozaiek.be/recensie/samo-salamon-sextet-the-colours-suite/ Mathias Bäumel (de) https://www.jazzzeitung.de/cms/2017/05/offen-und-kreativ-eine-farbenreiche-weitere-cd-von-samo-salamon/ Da A. G. Bertinetto (it) http://www.kathodik.it/modules.php?name=Reviews&rop=showcontent&id=6610
